title: Authorizes the city of Kingston to amortize the cost of payments to employees upon separation of service from such city during 2010
summary: Authorizes the city of Kingston to amortize the cost of payments to employees upon separation of service from such city during 2010.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to authorizing and empowering the city of Kingston to amortize the cost of payments to employees upon separation of service from the city during 2010
